description.p: This configuration file is a template used for the creation of new users. To have multiple values for a record (like objectClass), you must seperate each (on the same line) with %(,). Standard values may be specified as %(name). However, non-standard runtime values (set via -V VAR:VALUE) must be specified as %(var:name).

section.name: Author
section.p: ldapuseradd was written by Greg Schenzel <inittab@unixdev.net>

section.name: Comments
section.p: This man page was written using .
